title: Permission Slips - Featuring Maryam Hasnaa
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by longtime friend of the show, writer, Seer and Spiritual Practitioner, Maryam Hasnaa. We talk remembering to dream, designing new models of success within and outside of the system, and understanding our relationship to external validation.

Important Maryam Hasnaa Links:

* Our Ways of Knowing: An Exploration of the Intuitive Self Course  launches October 5th, 2022 and is a 6 week self paced course that will remain open for enrollment: https://www.maryamhasnaa.com/course-offerings

* Embodiment boxes are available on our Resonance Apothecary site: https://resonanceapothecary.com/products/embodiment-box

* We offer a variety of memberships to our New Earth Mystery School: https://www.maryamhasnaa.com/new-earth-mystery-school

*  In celebration of NEMS 5 year anniversary we have a 20% discount code from classes, class sets, Embodying Liberation Course, and Energy is  Currency Course. (Code: 5YROFNEMS) this expires 10/01/22

* We have a free Intuition: Back to Basics class via zoom this Sunday, October 2nd. All who feel aligned are welcomed to join using the public registration link:
us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/…Pi0Sa-CQ5SXo3h0ww

Black Business of the Week - https://hazelthebeautyrn.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:

PushBlack - If you want to take control of your finances and begin building wealth, tune into Building Black Dollars by PushBlack. Catch it anywhere you listen to podcasts.

ZocDoc - Go to Zocdoc.com/FRIENDZONE and download the Zocdoc app for FREE. Then start your search for a top-rated doctor today. Many are available within 24 hours.

Follow us online:  

Twitter - www.twitter.com/friendzonepod  
Facebook - www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast  
Patreon - www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast  
Discord - discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz

Have a GREAT day!
